text: Astley Baker Davies is an English animation company and studio based in London, England. owned by founders directors Neville Astley, Mark Baker and Phil Davies. It has produced television programmes such The Big Knights, Peppa Pig and Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom. In 2015 it became part of Entertainment One. In 2023, the company became part of Hasbro's newly created division Hasbro Entertainment due to eOne's film and television assets being sold to Lionsgate later in the year.
